fields.headline: Silvestre's season over
fields.bodyText: Manchester United's Mikaël Silvestre has been ruled out for the rest of the season after sustaining a cruciate ligament injury in his right knee in yesterday's 1-0 win over Everton. The 30-year-old defender went down in agony after trying to turn as he made a tackle during the first half at Goodison Park. Sir Alex Ferguson sent Silvestre for a scan back in Manchester and the results have only confirmed the United manager's worst fears. PA
